welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Santa Ana Jilotzingo, a charming city known for its rich culture and beautiful landscapes. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that this wonderful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The original terminal at Internacional Benito Juarez Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Internacional Benito Juarez Airport, primarily serving international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Internacional Benito Juarez Airport, exclusively serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be slow or unreliable at times.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A secondary terminal primarily used for domestic flights.
